Posts.Content: My nipple was inverted but stayed that way and unfortunately I was diagnosed with lobular Breast cancer 12 months ago. I had a mastectomy and immediate reconstruction. I am now cancer Â free I cannot emphasise enough to you to go and see your gp and get yourself checked as soon as possible by a medical professional. The earlier cancer is caught the better chance of a full recovery albeit you may not have cancer. Good luck and let me know how you get on xx Report 1 Reply
Posts.Title: Inverted nipple
